title: New: CATHEDRALS – Unbound
body:
Image: Alex Ember

San Francisco duo **CATHEDRALS** aka Brodie Jenkins and Johnny Hwin certainly nail the slick imagery with their debut showing; all caps band name, a single, ambiguous shot of the two on their [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/WeAreCathedrals) page, and most importantly, an uber cool composition in the form of _Unbound_. A slow burning electro-pop number, that’s sure to bring comparisons to **London Grammar, **the only criticism I can come up with is that it perhaps feels like it’s all over too soon. Check out _Unbound_ below.

A slow burning electro-pop number, that’s sure \[…\]
